name: Death Roll (advice-dog, The_IKEA_killer)
description:
You have died!

Luckily for you, Death likes to play games every now and then. Why don't you take a seat? The stakes of this game are quite high.

You are given the choice to play any game, and you decide something where the chances are in your favor. But Death doesn't seem to play fair.

Known issues:

- Sometimes when transitioning to the Arena, the player character is spawned in an incorrect position in a dark room. You need to restart the game - sorry.
